pl.mbdev.openstage
Class OptionText

java.lang.Object
  pl.mbdev.openstage.Xml
      pl.mbdev.openstage.OptionText

public class OptionText
extends Xml

Text field of the Option of the IppList. Option can contain up to 3 OptionTexts, and must contain the number of OptionTexts equal to the number of columns of the list, to which the Option is added.

     mb@mbdev.pl, http://mbdev.pl/
